name: Franks Quick Key Adventure
description:
Hello, this was just something i made real quick just to be able to finish something hope you enjoy. Follow me on twitter @DevDanyel you can see the progression of the game. And I might keep updating it.

P.S: I made this in a rush im sorry its pretty bad, also on the second scene where you press next it might take a second to register I have a lot of bugs that im still in the process of fixing.
